# cgImage

**Instance Property**

The underlying Quartz image data.

## Declaration

```swift
var cgImage: CGImage? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the image data has been purged because of memory constraints, invoking this method forces that data to be loaded back into memory. Reloading the image data may incur a performance penalty.

If the `UIImage` object was initialized using a `CIImage` object, the value of the property is `NULL`.

## Getting the image data

- **ciImage**: The underlying Core Image data.
- **images**: The complete array of image objects that compose the animation of an animated object.
- **imageAsset**: The image asset (if any) for the image.
